channel.title: Blog on Mind of Heinrich
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Mind of Heinrich

item.title: Wallpaper of the Week 42 - October 2020
item.description: Hi, to start my weekly wallpaper series I decided to share my personal background image! I’ve been using it on my home PC for over a year(!) now and I still love the colors and the composition. Hope you will enjoy it as much as I do! You can download the wallpaper in full resolution (2534x1901) by doing a right-click/longpress & safe or by using the original source I’ve linked below!
